content: make these sweet apple coasters in a flash with this easy to make pattern a basic circle with shaping stitches in the final round create a classic apple shape finish off with a simple stem and shaped leaf accent nice for teachers gifts strung together over the hearth or as seasonal coasters video tutorial so you get a good result is included pattern recommends 100% cotton for the body of the apple a 4 0 or 4 5 mm crochet hook and category 4 yarn
